start_boss.text: Stick together and we'll take that thing down.
Pincer it and it'll die like the rest.

retreat.text: Set the course. We're leaving here.

engaged.text: Enemy confirmed. Ship to combat power.

hull_50.text: Hull integrity at 50%. Damage control teams on the way.

hull_30.text: Hull integrity at 30%. Requesting permission to retreat.
Breach in critical areas. All teams, focus on maintaining combat capability.

overload.text: Flux overloaded. Requesting coverage until we handle it.
Flux exceeded the generator capacity. I need cover.

death.text: Commander, I lost the ship... Escaping.
Any surviving crew, get in the escape pods!

victory_boss.text: High value target has been eliminated.
